## Loading packages
```{r}
pacman::p_load(ggplot2, tidyverse)
```

## Loading data
```{r}
worddata <- read_csv("wordbank_instrument_data.csv")
childdata <- read_csv("wordbank_administration_data.csv")

#Merging data by child_id
data <- merge(worddata, childdata, by = "child_id")
```

## Cleaning data
```{r}
#only looking at words
data <- data %>%
  filter(item_kind == "word")

#removing words that are sounds
data <- data %>%
  filter(category != "sounds")

#removing unimportant columns
data <- subset(data, select = -c(downloaded.x, downloaded.y, age.y))

#renaming age column
data <- data %>%
  rename(age = age.x)

```
